task: Plan and execute a global virtual reality art exhibition hosted in multiple countries, involving: 1. Selecting innovative VR artworks from around the world. 2. Fundraising and sponsorship management. 3. Developing multilingual VR experiences and guides. 4. Coordinating with international art galleries for simultaneous virtual launch. 5. Implementing a real-time feedback system and data analytics. 6. Ensuring cybersecurity measures for all virtual platforms.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The point of contact for initiating and organizing the global VR art exhibition.

agents.name: art_selection_agent
agents.role: Selects innovative VR artworks for the exhibition.

agents.name: global_artwork_curator_agent
agents.role: Curates artworks globally and handles artist relations.

agents.name: artist_contact_agent
agents.role: Manages communications with artists and the submission of their work.

agents.name: artwork_review_committee_agent
agents.role: Facilitates the evaluation and approval of submitted artworks.

agents.name: fundraising_agent
agents.role: Handles fundraising initiatives and maintains sponsor relationships.

agents.name: sponsorship_acquisition_agent
agents.role: Sources potential sponsors and negotiates sponsorship deals.

agents.name: vr_technology_agent
agents.role: Develops and maintains VR technologies and multilingual support.

agents.name: multilingual_support_agent
agents.role: Provides translation and language services for the VR experiences.

agents.name: gallery_coordination_agent
agents.role: Coordinates with art galleries for synchronized virtual launch.

agents.name: international_launch_agent
agents.role: Ensures simultaneous launch of exhibitions across different galleries and time zones.

agents.name: data_analytics_agent
agents.role: Implements feedback systems and analytics tools to track event success.

agents.name: feedback_implementation_agent
agents.role: Sets up real-time feedback collection and data analysis systems.

agents.name: cybersecurity_agent
agents.role: Ensures the security of all virtual platforms used in the exhibition.

agents.name: virtual_security_specialist
agents.role: Designs and implements security protocols for VR platforms.

agents.name: logistics_agent
agents.role: Coordinates logistics for the installation and maintenance of VR equipment globally.

agents.name: supply_chain_manager_agent
agents.role: Manages the supply chain and ensures timely delivery of equipment.

agents.name: media_management_agent
agents.role: Oversees all media relations and publicity for the exhibition.

agents.name: media_relations_agent
agents.role: Handles media outreach and press communication activities.

agents.name: legal_support_agent
agents.role: Offers legal guidance and ensures compliance with international laws.

agents.name: legal_advisor_agent
agents.role: Provides legal advice and documentation for the exhibition activities.

agents.name: crisis_response_agent
agents.role: Prepares crisis management plans and handles emergencies during the event.

agents.name: crisis_management_agent
agents.role: Develops strategies for managing crises and ensures safety during the exhibition.

agents.name: creative_direction_agent
agents.role: Oversees creative vision and coordinates artistic elements across the exhibition.

agents.name: creative_director_agent
agents.role: Directs the artistic strategy and vision for the VR exhibition.

agents.name: sustainability_management_agent
agents.role: Advises on sustainable practices to minimize environmental impact.

agents.name: environmental_sustainability_agent
agents.role: Implements sustainability measures to reduce the event's carbon footprint.

tools.name: art_submission_tool
tools.description: Facilitates the submission of VR artworks from artists worldwide.

artwork_title.description: Title of the artwork being submitted.

artist_name.description: Name of the artist submitting the work.

tools.name: sponsor_database_tool
tools.description: Maintains potential sponsors and existing partnership data.

sponsor_name.description: Name of the sponsor or organization.

tools.name: vr_translation_tool
tools.description: Provides multilingual support for VR experiences and guides.

language_pairs.description: Languages pairs for translation, e.g., English to Spanish.

content_type.description: Type of VR content to be translated.

tools.name: event_synchronization_tool
tools.description: Synchronizes virtual event launches across different time zones.

time_zones.description: List of time zones involved in the event.

launch_schedule.description: The timing for event launches in each time zone in minutes.

tools.name: real_time_monitoring_tool
tools.description: Collects and analyzes real-time feedback during the exhibition.

metrics_collected.description: Metrics to be collected, e.g., User Engagement, Satisfaction.

feedback_frequency.description: Frequency of feedback collection during the event in minutes.

tools.name: security_protocol_tool
tools.description: Establishes cybersecurity measures across all VR platforms.

security_measures.description: The specific security protocols to be enforced.

platforms_covered.description: List of VR platforms requiring security measures.

tools.name: warehouse_coordination_tool
tools.description: Manages the logistics of storing and distributing VR equipment.

storage_locations.description: List of storage locations for equipment.

distribution_schedule.description: Time frame for distributing equipment in days.

tools.name: press_release_tool
tools.description: Manages the creation and distribution of press releases to media outlets.

media_list.description: List of media outlets targeted for the press release.

release_date.description: Scheduled date for the press release.
